choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today.
Sure, here is an example of what I think would be a good menu to eat this week. 
- Breakfast - 2 eggs with 1/2 cup oatmeal and coffee or tea (coffee if you are not fasting)  
- Lunch – Salad with chicken breast, avocado slices and olive oil dressing   
- Dinner– Grilled salmon, brown rice, steamed broccoli 

I hope this is helpful.
